Pre-Game Insights: The Utah Jazz are looking to avoid a fourth consecutive loss, having lost to the Warriors, Mavericks, and Kings by a minimum of 8 points each.
The San Antonio Spurs aim to win and potentially secure a playoff spot this season.
Lauri Markkanen of the Jazz is questionable for the game due to an injury sustained in the previous match.
Chris Paul and Julian Champagnie are expected to start for the Spurs, with Devin Vassell and Tre Jones still out.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is being played in Salt Lake City, Utah.
